title: Duly Noted
author: VD
content_html:
“The answer to the question ‘do you have any antisemitic beliefs’ is always ‘NO’ without equivocation.”

  • Jonathan Greenblatt, ADL

There it is, right from the horse’s mouth. Remember that, in case you are ever asked.

DISCUSS ON SG
